content: this is an easy and beginner friendly pattern for a cupcake shaped trinket storage box the upper and bottom parts are are worked using medium worsted weight yarn and g/4 mm crochet hook and the flower is worked using a sport weight yarn and 3 mm crochet hook you ll need some buttons beads or pompoms for decoration a video tutorial is available at https //youtu be/7jbp4fv77f4 si=f3zisd8weanbiwui
